content.question: Two moons are in circular orbits around the same planet. Moon 1 has an orbital radius of <math alttext="r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>r</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and an orbital period of <math alttext="T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Moon 2 has an orbital radius of <math alttext="9 r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>r</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the orbital period of moon 2 ?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
